text: Sam Pitroda - I am shocked to see your remarks. The whole world is with us in our fight against terror except few like you and your patrons. #SamPitroda
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Shooting in Netherlands - I have spoken to @venurajamony Indian Ambassador in Netherlands. Please do not worry. We are keeping a close watch on the situation. @IndinNederlands #utrechtshooting
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: मनोहर पर्रिकर जी के देहांत का समाचार सुनकर बहुत दुःख हुआ।  हालाँकि वो बहुत समय से बीमार थे तो भी मन इसके लिए तैयार नहीं था कि वह हमें इतनी जल्दी छोड़ जायेंगे।  मेरे लिए तो वो भाई की तरह थे इसलिए उनका निधन मेरे लिए व्यक्तिगत क्षति है।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: India's Foreign Policy under Modi Government :
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: That's really a good job by Indian High Commission in Mozambique.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Indians requiring assistance should contact Indian High Commission in New Zealand on 021803899 or 021850033. @IndiainNZ @WIAWellington
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: http://mymea.in/dy6
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Any Indian requiring assistance should contact Indian High Commission in New Zealand on 021803899 or 021850033. @IndiainNZ @WIAWellington @kohli_sanjiv
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: In this moment of grief, India stands in solidarity with the people and Government of New Zealand @winstonpeters /2
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: We strongly condemn the dastardly terrorist attacks at the places of worship in Christchurch. Our heartfelt condolences to those who lost their loved ones. Our thoughts and prayers are with the affected families. /1
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I have shared these facts with you so that leaders who describe this as our diplomatic failure may see for themselves that in 2009, India was alone. In 2019, India has the world wide support. /7
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Thus, we have secured an unprecedented support from the international community for listing of Masood Azhar under the UN Sanctions Committee.  /6
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: In 2019, the proposal was moved by USA, France and UK and supported by 14 of the 15 UN Security Council Members and also co-sponsored by Australia, Bangladesh, Italy and Japan - non members of the Security Council. /5
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: In 2017, USA,UK and France moved the proposal. /4
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: In 2016, India's proposal was co-sponsored by USA, France and UK. /3
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: In 2009,  India under the UPA Government was the lone proposer. /2
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I wish to apprise you of the facts regarding listing of Masood Azhar under the United Nations Sanctions Committee. The proposal has been mooted four times. /1
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: There is no problem. After becoming Foreign Minister,  I have learnt to follow English of all accents and grammar.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: मेरे चुनाव ना लड़ने से कोई फ़र्क़ नहीं पड़ता. श्री नरेंद्र मोदी जी को पुनः प्रधान मंत्री बनाने के लिए भारतीय जनता पार्टी के उम्मीदवारों को जिताने में हम सब जी जान लगा देंगे.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I am asking Indian High Commissioner in Malaysia to help you. @hcikl
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: @CPVIndia - Pls resolve this.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Thanks for your kind words Malini ji.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I appreciate this. Pls keep it up.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: @IndiainToronto is in touch with you and will provide you all help.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I have spoken to the bereaved family members of Shikha Garg, Manisha and Vaidyas.  Please be assured that Indian missions in Ethiopia and Kenya are there to help you in all matters including identification of their remains and belongings. @IndiaInEthiopia @IndiainKenya
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I am trying to reach the family of Shikha Garg who has unfortunately died in the air crash. I have tried her husband's number many times. Please help me reach her family.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I have spoken to son of Mr Vaidya in Toronto. I am shocked you hv lost 6 members of your family in air crash. My heartfelt condolences. I hv asked @IndiainKenya @IndiaInEthiopia to reach u immediately. They will provide help and assistance in respect of all your family members.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
I have asked Rahul Chhabra, Indian High Commissioner in Nairobi to provide them all help and assistance. @IndiainKenya
Rahul - Please keep me informed.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Pls help me reach their families.  @IndiaInEthiopia
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: My colleague Dr.Harshvardhan has confirmed that Ms.Shikha Garg is a Consultant with Ministry of Environment and Forests. She was travelling to attend UNEP meeting in Nairobi. I am trying to reach the families of other Indian nationals. PL RT and help.  @IndiaInEthiopia /3
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: @IndiaInEthiopia has informed me that the deceased Indian nationals are Vaidya Pannagesh Bhaskar, Vaidya Hansin Annagesh, Nukavarapu Manisha and Shikha Garg. /2
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I am sorry to know about the unfortunate crash of Ethiopian Airlines plane ET 302. We have lost four Indian nationals in the air crash. I have asked Indian High Commissioner in Ethiopia to provide all help and assistance to the bereaved families. @IndiaInEthiopia
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: My speech at the 50th anniversary of OIC Meet in Abu Dhabi on 1st March 2019 -
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: बहुत बहुत अभिनन्दन प्रधानमंत्री @narendramodi जी। India Today Conclave  में तथ्यों और तर्कों से परिपूर्ण आपके उद्बोधन ने समूचे देश को आत्मविश्वास से भर दिया। सच में 21वीं सदी भारत की होगी।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Prime Minister @narendramodi ji I do not have the words to thank you enough for your kind words. I pray to Lord Krishna to continue to shower His blessings on you.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: प्रधानमंत्री @narendramodi जी मेरे प्रति व्यक्त की  गई आपकी भावनाओं का धन्यवाद देने के लिए मुझे शब्द नहीं मिल रहे। भगवान कृष्ण की कृपा आप पर सदैव बरसती रहे, यही प्रार्थना करती हूँ ।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: एनआरआई शादी का पंजीकरण 30 दिन में जरूरी     एनआरआई शादी का पंजीकरण 30 दिन में जरूरी     संपत्ति कुर्क करने का प्रावधान   संपत्ति कुर्क करने का प्रावधान http://epaper.livehindustan.com/imageview_95653_90599822_4_1_12-02-2019_i_20.pagezoomsinwindows.php … via @Live_Hindustan
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Bill to counter exploitation by NRI spouses.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: We thank Abu Dhabi for declaring Hindi as one of the official languages in their judicial system. This will make justice delivery system simpler and more accessible to our people.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I have also spoken to @capt_amarinder, Chief Minister, Punjab to apprehend the concerned travel agents. He has promised immediate action in the matter. /2
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I have seen the news report in Daily Hindustan dated 7th February reg four Indians from Punjab who are stranded in Armenia. Indian Ambassador in Armenia has reached them and is providing all help and assistance. @IndiainArmenia  /1
author: SushmaSwaraj
SushmaSwaraj

text: Yes, I am also a lawyer. I joined the Bar in 1973. I was practising before Supreme Court of India before I became a Cabinet Minister in Haryana in 1977. It is 42 years now.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: That's true Sunanda. @governorswaraj & I defended George Fernandes in the famous Baroda Dynamite case during emergency.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I have spoken to the Indian Ambassador in Ukraine. We have taken this up at the highest level with the Government of Ukraine. Please rest assured that we will spare no effort.  @IndiainUkraine
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: गरीब के  कल्याण को समर्पित  किसान के सम्मान को समर्पित और  मध्यम वर्ग के स्वाभिमान को समर्पित बजट के लिए प्रधानमंत्री @narendramodi जी का बहुत बहुत अभिनंदन।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: मकर संक्रांति की हार्दिक शुभ कामनाएं. Heartiest greetings on Makar Sankranti.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Rahul Gandhi's comments on Defence Minister Nirmala Sitaraman's reply to a debate on a subject relating to Ministry of Defence is a new low in the history of Indian politics.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: इन दोनों क्रन्तिकारी विधेयकों को पारित करवाने के लिए प्रधान मंत्री जी को बहुत बहुत बधाई और आभार. /3
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: एक अन्य संविधान संशोधन विधेयक भी पारित किया गया जिसके द्वारा अनुसूचित जाति, जनजाति और पिछड़े वर्गों को दिए जा रहे आरक्षण में कोई भी कमी ना करते हुए स्वर्ण समुदाय के गरीबों को भी 10 % आरक्षण प्रदान किया गया है. /2
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: 8 जनवरी 2019 का दिन भारत की लोक सभा के लिए एक ऐतिहासिक दिवस है.आज लोक सभा ने अफ़ग़ानिस्तान, बांग्लादेश, पाकिस्तान से भारत में आए हुए प्रताड़ित अल्पसंख्योंको जैसे हिन्दू, सिख, बौद्ध, जैन, पारसी और इसाई समुदाय के लोगों को भारत की नागरिकता प्रदान किये जाने वाला विधेयक पारित किया है.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: नव वर्ष की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं. Happy New Year.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Merry Christmas.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Alok - I am proud of you. Please convey my gratitude to Bahraini authorities for their help in rescuing an Indian citizen.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: My deepest condolences to the families of victims who lost their lives in the Tsunami that struck the coast of Sunda Straits in Indonesia. Our prayers are with them as we stand by our Indonesian brothers in this hour of grief @Menlu_RI
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
I have asked Indian Embassy in Thailand to help them.
@IndiainThailand
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
Navtej - Please help the family. 
@IndianEmbassyUS

text:
Vipul - Are you aware of this case ? Pls send me a report.
@cgidubai
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Alok - I know you are working for her rescue. The situation appears to be serious. This requires immediate intervention on your part. Pls keep me informed.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Let me explain to you that we were not trapped by your 'googlies'. Our two Sikh Ministers went to Kartarpur Sahib to offer prayers in the Holy Gurudwara. /2
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Mr.Foreign Minister of Pakistan - Your 'googly' remarks in a dramatic manner has exposed none but YOU. This shows that you have no respect for Sikh sentiments. You only play 'googlies'. /1
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: My tributes to the victims and brave martyrs of dastardly 26/11 Mumbai terror attacks on its 10th Anniversary. We will continue to seek justice for their families and friends.  India will defeat terrorism.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Thanks for prompt correction Nidhi.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: It is an immature and senseless statement.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: We hope that the Government of Pakistan will expedite construction of the corridor in order to ensure that our citizens can pay their respects at the Gurudwara Kartarpur Sahib using the corridor as soon as possible. /3
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Since I am unable to travel to Kartarpur Sahib on the scheduled date, Government of India will be represented by my esteemed colleagues Mrs.Harsimrat Kaur Badal and Mr.H.S.Puri. /2
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I thank HE Makhdoom Shah Mahmood Qureshi Foreign Minister of Pakistan for inviting me to attend the groundbreaking ceremony of the Kartarpur Sahib corridor on the Pakistan side of the International boundary on 28 November 2018. /1
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Indonesian authorities have confirmed identification of the body of Capt.Bhavya Suneja.  The remains will be handed over to the family in the presence of @IndianEmbJkt today. My heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Mridul - Please send me a detailed report on this. @hcikl
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Shashi ji - I am aware of this case. Indian High Commission in Mozambique is doing their best. @IndiainMoz
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Partha - Please take this up at the highest level with the Government of Ukraine.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Mary Kom - Congratulations. You have done us proud. @MangteC
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: गुरु नानक देव जी के 550वें प्रकाश पर्व के उत्सव पर मेरी बहुत बहुत बधाई एवं शुभकामनाएं।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Thanks for your kind words, Shashi. I wish we both continue in our respective positions.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: You are right, Swapan. I am not retiring from politics. It is just that I am not contesting the next Lok Sabha election due to my health issues.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I am pained to know about the sad demise of Shri Ananth Kumar. He was like my younger brother. His death is a personal loss for me.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: इस सफलता ने भारत के रक्षा एवं सुरक्षा के क्षेत्र में एक नया आयाम जोड़ा है। हमारे वैज्ञानिकों को इस उपलब्धि के लिए हार्दिक बधाई और प्रधानमंत्री @narendramodi जी को सशक्त नेतृत्व देने के लिए बहुत-बहुत आभार।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: भारत की परमाणु बैलेस्टिक मिसाइल पनडुब्बी(NBMS) आईएनएस अरिहंत हाल ही में अपने पहले Deterrence Patrol से वापस लौटी है।पनडुब्बी के इस अभ्यास से भारत की नाभिकीय त्रिकोण की पूर्ण स्थापना हो गई है।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
करवा चौथ की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं. Heartiest greetings on Karwa Chauth.
                                             ---- @sushmaswaraj & @governorswaraj
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: मैंने भी कल इस एप पर 1000 रुपए की  राशि दी है। मेरा सभी भाजपा कार्यकर्ताओं, समर्थकों तथा हितैषियों से अनुरोध है कि सार्वजनिक जीवन में शुचिता बनाये रखने के लिए इस अभियान में अपना योगदान अवश्य दें। @BJP4India
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: सार्वजनिक जीवन में शुचिता बहुत आवश्यक है। इसी आवश्यकता को महसूस करते हुए भाजपा ने “नरेंद्र मोदी एप” पर अपने कार्यकर्ताओं तथा समर्थकों से छोटी राशि इकट्ठी करने का अभियान चलाया है। इसमें 50 से लेकर 1000 रुपए तक की राशि दी जा सकती है। 1000 रुपए से अधिक की राशि स्वीकार नहीं की जाती।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: दूरदर्शन को हार्दिक धन्यवाद देती हूँ जो विश्व द्वारा बापू को दी गई इस अनूठी श्रद्धांजलि को देशवासियों को दिखा रहे हैं तथा प्रधानमंत्री @narendramodi जी के प्रति कृतज्ञता व्यक्त करती हूँ जिन्होंने हम पर विश्वास करके यह कार्य हमें सौंपा ।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: मैं अपने सभी राजदूतों तथा बाहरी प्रचार प्रसार विभाग (XP Division) के अधिकारियो को बधाई और शाबाशी देती हूँ जिन्होंने असंभव समझे जाने वाले इस कार्य को संभव कर दिखाया। सभी गायकों के प्रति आभार प्रकट करती हूँ जिन्होंने भाषा की बाधा को पार करते हुए पूरे मनोभाव के साथ इसे गाया।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: पिछले तीन दिनों में अल्जीरिया, बोत्सवाना और बोलीविया के गायकों द्वारा गाये गए महात्मा गाँधी जी के प्रिय भजन "वैष्णव जन तो तेने कहिये" की प्रस्तुतियां दूरदर्शन पर देखीं। मन आनंद से भर गया। यह अनोखा विचार प्रधानमंत्री @narendramodi जी का था जिसे विदेश मंत्रालय ने अमली जामा पहनाया।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I am happy to inform that India has been elected to the United Nations Human Rights Council with highest number of votes. We have secured 188 votes out of 193.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: आज संयुक्त राष्ट्र के महासचिव श्री एंटोनिओ गुटरेस ने एक समारोह में प्रधानमंत्री  @narendramodi जी को "चैंपियंस ऑफ़ दा ेअर्थ" पुरुस्कार  से सम्मानित किया। भारत गौरवान्वित हुआ।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: The world joins in paying homage to Bapu - PM @narendramodi released a medley version of Bhajan 'Vaishnav Jan To' from artists of 124 countries at a function in Rashtrapati Bhawan. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2sj0qvm3KRE … …
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
आज शाम 7.00 बजे : संयुक्त राष्ट्र महासभा में भारत का सम्बोधन, #UNGA
Today at 7 PM : India is addressing the United Nations General Assembly. #UNGA
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: आदरणीय दीनदयाल उपाध्याय जी की स्मृति को मेरा सादर नमन।
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
प्रधानमंत्री@narendramodi जी जन्मदिन की हार्दिक बधाई और शुभकामनाएं. ईश्वर आपको दीर्घायु करें और आप इसी लगन और परिश्रम से देश की सेवा करते रहें. 
PradhanMantriji Heartiest greetings & best wishes on your birthday. May God bless you with long life & dedicated service to the nation.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I am sorry to know about the sad demise of Mrs.Kulsoom Nawaz. My heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family. May her soul rest in peace.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I have just spoken to the Indian Ambassador in Switzerland Mr.Siby George. He has updated me on the situation. Our First Secretary and his wife were with the family during the day.  Indian Embassy is providing them all possible help and assistance. @IndiainSwiss.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: In 2014 we had 77 Passport Sewa Kendras in the country. Now we have 308 PSKs - that is four times in four years. Our effort is to open a PSK in all the parliamentary constituencies in the country. You will certainly have one in Kannauj too.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I am aware of this. Our Ambassador in Switzerland Mr.Siby George contacted the family yesterday itself. Rest assured, we are providing them all help and assistance.  We pray for an early recovery of Mr.Ajay Dubey. @IndiainSwiss
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: With the sad demise of Shri Atal Bihari Vajpayee, an era has ended. He was liked by his opponents and loved by the party cadres. His amiability and generosity were the unique aspects of his personality. My heartfelt tribute to Shri Atal ji.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: श्री अटल बिहारी वाजपेयी के जाने से एक युग समाप्त हो गया. वह विरोधियों के भी चहेते और कार्यकर्ताओं के आत्मीय नेता थे. स्वाभाव की सहजता और हृदय की उदारता उनके व्यक्तित्व की विशेष खूबी थी. उनके प्रति मेरी भावभीनी श्रद्धांजलि.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
स्वतंत्रता दिवस की हार्दिक बधाई. 
Heartiest greetings on Independence day.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
आज हरियाली तीज है - बेटियों का त्यौहार. 
देश की सभी बेटियों को मेरी ओर से हरियाली तीज की बहुत बहुत बधाई. 

Hariyali Teej - Daughter's day. 
My heartiest greetings to all daughters of the country on Hariyali Teej.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I am sorry to know about the sad demise of Shri #SomnathChatterjee. In spite of our ideological differences, we cherished a very cordial relationship. My heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Vikas - Please help the family in this hour of grief. @HCI_Ottawa
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: There are unprecedented floods in Kerala causing huge damage. We have decided that as the situation becomes normal, passports damaged on account floods shall be replaced free of charge. Please contact the concerned Passport Kendras. #KeralaFloods Pls RT

text: We are repatriating Rohit Pal and Rishab Gupta crew members of MV Maharishi Vamdeva from Fujairah. They suffered heat stroke because there was no air conditioning/light in the ship. @CGIDubai provided provisions to crew members and is repatriating other members of the crew.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: R.P.Vaidya and K.P.Vaidya who had gone to to Malaysia for business purposes were abducted on 3rd Aug 2018. I am happy to inform that with the efforts of our High Commissioner Mridul Kumar and his team, Malaysian Police has secured release of both Indian nationals on 6th Aug 2018.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: 11वाँ विश्व हिंदी सम्मेलन 18-20 अगस्त तक मॉरिशस में आयोजित किया जा रहा है. इस बार के सम्मलेन का विषय है 'हिंदी विश्‍व और भारतीय संस्‍कृति'. अभूतपूर्व उत्साह! पंजीकरण की समाप्ति पर 1422 प्रतिभागियों द्वारा वेबसाइट के माध्यम से उपस्थिति दर्शायी गयी |
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I am happy to inform that 21 Indian fishermen from Tamil Nadu who were stranded at Nakhitaghi (Iran) have been  released with the efforts of Indian Embassy in Iran and our Consulate at Bandar Abbas. We are repatriating them to Chennai in batches starting from 3rd august 2018.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
परदेस में आपका दोस्त - भारतीय दूतावास. 
विदेश में अगर आप किसी संकट में हों तो तुरंत भारतीय दूतावास से संपर्क करें. वो अवश्य आपकी सहायता करेंगे. 
कृपया रीट्वीट कर दें.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
Indian Embassy is your home away from home. Whenever in trouble, please contact the Indian Embassy/Consulate. They will always help you.

text: @capt_amarinder I am happy to inform that Simran has been rescued. We are flying her back to India. She will be reaching Amritsar by IX 192 at 13.25 pm on 29th July 2018. I very much appreciate the efforts of @cgidubai and Mr. Roop Sidhu, General Secretary Indian Assn Ajman./1

text: I read two Shalokas of Shrimad Bhagwad Geeta every morning and try to imbibe them in my life.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
सुखदु:खे समे कृत्वा लाभालाभौ जयाजयौ,
ततो युद्धाय युज्यस्व नैवं पापमवाप्स्यसि.

Fight for the sake of duty, treating happiness and despair, loss and gain, victory and defeat alike. Fulfilling your responsibility in this way, you will never incur sin.

Bhagvad Gita Ch 2, Verse 38
author: SushmaSwaraj
SushmaSwaraj

text:
श्री कृष्ण ही मेरे गुरु हैं और श्रीमद भगवद गीता मेरी मार्गदर्शिका. आज गुरुपूर्णिमा के अवसर पर भगवन कृष्ण के श्री चरणों में मेरा बार बार प्रणाम.
Lord krishna is my Guru. Shrimad Bhagvad Gita is my guide. On the auspicious occasion of Guru Purnima, my pranam to Lord Krishna.

text: I am happy to inform that all Kailash Mansarovar Yatris stranded at Gunji (Uttarakhand) have been evacuated and brought to Pithoragarh by IAF helicopters. With this, normal movement of Yatris has recommenced.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: We have 115 Kailash-Mansarovar yatris stranded at Gunji (Uttarakhand) due to inclement weather. They are being looked after by ITBP and Kumaon Vikas Mandal. As weather conditions improve, they will be airlifted to Pithoragarh.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: I had an occasion to address a public meeting in Sanskrit in village Mattur in Karnataka where all residents speak Sanskrit irrespective of their religion. https://speakzeasy.wordpress.com/2015/05/11/mattur/ …
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:

Pradhan Mantri ji - My heartiest congratulations on winning the vote of confidence with a huge margin. @narendramodi
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
और हम झुके-झुके,
मोड़ पर रुके-रुके
उम्र के चढ़ाव का उतार देखते रहे
कारवां गुज़र गया, गुबार देखते रहे।

महाकवि नीरज जी को मेरी  विनम्र श्रद्धांजलि!

text:
भगवन कृष्ण के प्रति समपर्ण का भाव अहंकार छोड़ने पर ही आता है. 
गुस्सा तो आप कर रहे हैं. 
मैं तो आपके गुस्से के बाद भी अपना काम शांति से पहले की तरह कर रही हूँ.
author: SushmaSwaraj

text:
भगवन कृष्ण के प्रति मेरा सम्पूर्ण समर्पण और अटूट विश्वास है. 
इसलिए मैं न कभी विचलित होती हूँ. ना धीरज खोती हूँ.

कर्मण्येवाधिकारस्ते मा फलेषु कदाचन। 
मा कर्मफलहेतुर्भूर्मा ते सङ्गोऽस्त्वकर्मणि॥
author: SushmaSwaraj

author: SushmaSwaraj

text: In Simikot a health check up has been done on all the elderly pilgrims. They are being provided required medical help. In Hilsa we have requested police authorities for necessary assistance.  /3 #IndiansStrandedInNepal
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Indian Embassy in Nepal has deployed representatives in Nepalganj and Simikot. They are touch with the pilgrims and ensuring that food and lodging facilities are available to all the pilgrims. /2 #IndiansStrandedInNepal
author: SushmaSwaraj

text: Indian pilgrims stranded in Nepal - There are about 525 pilgrims stranded in Simikot, 550 in Hilsa and another 500 in Tibet side. /1 #IndiansStrandedInNepal

text:
भारतीय जनता पार्टी के स्थापना दिवस की हार्दिक शुभकामनाएं।

1980 से 2018 की समयावधि में अपने त्याग, लगन एवं कठोर परिश्रम से भारतीय जनता पार्टी को विश्व के सबसे बड़े राजनैतिक दल में परिवर्तित करने वाले सभी कार्यकर्ताओं को मेरा नमन्।

text: त्रिपुरा की विजय उन प्रमाणिक कार्यकर्ताओं की विजय है जो हिंसा और हत्या के राजनैतिक वातावरण में भी अपनी विचारधारा पर अडिग रहे. उन शहीदों को नमन और उन कार्यकर्ताओं का अभिनन्दन. प्रधान मंत्री श्री नरेंद्र मोदी के नेतृत्व और श्री अमित शाह जी के संगठन कौशल के लिए बहुत बहुत बधाई.

text: Merchant Ship Marine Express with 22 Indian nationals is missing off the Coast of Benin in the Gulf of Guinea. We are making all out efforts in coordination with Nigerian and Benin naval authorities to trace the missing ship. We have set up a Helpline no.(+234)9070343860.
